messages.message: Hi team- could we add the ability for users to add dynamic documents to the chat context when they're interacting with a chatbot? An example is demonstrated here (https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/cbfefd98-2f79-45a0-bdec-9f318952aa69) of a user reviewing claims. The chatbot is preloaded with policies that are shared across users, but each user could have a specific claim they want to use as context to find the relevant policy information. Instead of having to transcribe information from that reference doc into a prompt it'd be nice to just be able to upload the reference doc into the chat and then use the prompt to describe the task that should be completed.

@Matt Vielkind This is quite interesting and been something we've been thinking about. Could you share more information about who the customer is here? Did this insight come from a demo you did? The reason I ask is that we'd love to sign someone up as a design partner as we build something like this
